subject: Not just ghost hunter related.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Homer was an ancient greek writer, Sybil was the psychic oracles they used
in the way back times. If memeory serves, they mentioned these ancient
prophecies on History's Nostradomus Effect series. These ancient pschic did
not have all the stupid distractions we do, like radio TV and friggin' ipods
stuck in their ears. So their psychic sense was much more active. I think
they studied this time--our time, the end times- in great detail. That's why
there are images of planes and helicopters in pyramids, scuba divers,
submarines, men in space suites--and on and on.  I know, everyone knows
better. I see stuff ahead of time, and my senses are pathetic. I don't know
what I'm seeing til I see it in real life,  I dreamed about he shuttle
blowing the night before, but didn't know what it was til later in the day.

F-S
